name: @aprestmo/norway-geodata
description: Administrative geographic data for Norway including municipalities, counties, and postal codes.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.test: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Running TypeScript validation...'); require('./dist/index.js'); console.log('âœ… All exports working correctly!');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build && npm test
scripts.check-conflicts: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const localVer=pkg.version; console.log('Local version:', localVer); require('child_process').exec('npm view @aprestmo/norway-geodata version', (err,stdout) => { if(err) { console.log('âœ… Package not published yet - safe to publish'); return; } const remoteVer=stdout.trim(); console.log('Published version:', remoteVer); if(localVer===remoteVer) console.log('âŒ Version conflict! Local version already published'); else console.log('âœ… No conflicts - safe to publish'); });"
scripts.version-status: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); console.log('ðŸ“¦ Package:', pkg.name); console.log('ðŸ·ï¸  Local version:', pkg.version); require('child_process').exec('npm view @aprestmo/norway-geodata version', (err,stdout) => { if(err) { console.log('ðŸ“¡ Published: Not yet published'); } else { console.log('ðŸ“¡ Published version:', stdout.trim()); } });"
scripts.publish:npm: npm run check-conflicts && npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:both: npm run publish:npm && npm run publish:github
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish:npm
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run publish:npm

author: Alexander Prestmo
